About Me

Here's a bit about me...

BIO

My name is Justin Nappi, I am a developer, designer, entrepreneur, and video game enthusiast. I have a passion for creating front-end and back-end applications as well as designing social media graphics and clothing.

I have experience using Git, Python, C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SCSS. I am also trained in Windows 10 and ChromeOS
